name: happy-hour-someone-get-the-hook
title: Happy Hour: Someone Get The Hook
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: What better way to cap off the week than to talk about John Rich's latest episode of John Rich-ish behavior? This time, it's two fights in 24 hours.
contentEncoded:
• What better way to cap off the week than to talk about John Rich’s latest episode of John Rich-ish behavior? This time, it’s two fights in 24 hours. Quote of the day from victim #2, Jerry Montano: “The little guy hit me!” [TMZ]
  • The douchebag that shot and killed a Roma’s Pizza employee a few weeks back is still on the run, and police don’t seem to be anywhere close to catching him. And also, he only left the store with $3 from the tip jar. Worth it? [WSMV]
  • Young people and women are dominating Tennessee’s new voter registrations this year, and the turnout for early voting was way higher than in 2004. [WTVF]
  • Mayor Dean announced the $200K in Federal foreclosure grants this afternoon, which could mean as much as $2,500 for eligible families.

Photo by crackerbunny.

No related posts.
